attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bismillah: (In the name of Allah)

All Muslims regard Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) as their role model, teacher and guide. He is holy, beloved and revered to all Muslims. We therefore urge the Prime Minister to ban this website as it demoralises and humiliates our prophet and our religion. It is considered religious discrimination by all who have signed this petition.

We have a right for others not to discriminate against our faith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
